title: Chapter 1471 - Changes To The Dark And Gold Star Realm
volume_title: His Sword Takes Aim A The Three Thousand Worlds Of The Stars, Suppressing Foes Both Past And Present
body:
Chapter 1471 - Changes To The Dark And Gold Star Realm

“So many people!”

Qing Tang immediately sensed that something was amiss too.

They’d encountered numerous cultivators while crossing the Nightmare Winds belt. They were densely packed, a rain of dazzling beams of flowing light.

Su Yi took out his jug of wine, calmed his heart, and listened. A cacophony of voices instantly flooded into his ears.

“The Temple Master has returned, and his cultivation base is even stronger than before! All of this is because he controls the power of reincarnation!”

“They say even the gods prohibit this power, and that it was supposed to have disappeared from this world a long time ago. Who could have imagined that the Temple Master would locate this forbidden power?”

“If the Temple Master found it, we have a shot of finding it too!”

“See that? All of those are people venturing to the Dark and Gold Star Realm in search of the secrets of reincarnation…”

…Practically every conversation they overheard along the way was about the secrets of reincarnation.

Su Yi finally understood just why so many people had been crossing the Nightmare Winds Belt. Their goal...
original_title: Chapter 1471 - Changes to the Dark and Gold Star Realm
